Package org.jboss.narayana.jta.jms

Class ConnectionFactoryProxy

java.lang.Object
org.jboss.narayana.jta.jms.ConnectionFactoryProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.jms.ConnectionFactory
public class ConnectionFactoryProxy extends Object implements jakarta.jms.ConnectionFactory
Proxy connection factory to wrap around provided XAConnectionFactory.
Author:
Gytis Trikleris
